operations.reasoning: Konrad reported progress on Zendesk Help Center article sync - adding rate limiting and reusing ticket backfill logic. Meaningful update to existing task.

updateData.description:
Add Zendesk Help Center article syncing with incremental behavior.

- Use Zendesk Help Center APIs to fetch articles
- Implement incremental sync via updated_since timestamp
- Convert HTML content to Markdown for indexing
- Reuse ticket backfill logic for pagination and concurrency
- Add client-side request rate limiting to avoid 429s
- Validate on staging

operations.reasoning: Chandler reported progress on health checks - specifically adding webhook failure monitoring and PostHog instrumentation. Meaningful update to existing task.

updateData.description:
Broaden health checks and expose connector status in UI.

- Add checks for configuration errors, auth errors, and edge cases
- Implement UI indicators showing connector health
- Add reconnect actions for failed connectors
- Add health checks for webhook failures specifically
- Update PostHog instrumentation for new connector installations table
- Incrementally expand coverage across all connectors
